mapper.select: select distinct nation from country order by no
select no, nation, state from country where nation=#{param1} order by no

select r.resstate, r.resno, r.resname, r.resgrade, r.resadress, r.rescontent, c.nation, c.state from restaurant_table r join country c on r.resnation = c.nation and r.resstate=c.state where r.resnation=#{param1} and r.resstate=#{param2}
